message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value and potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $14,000.  I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. I'm still very interested in purchasing the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your interest and counteroffer. While I'm aiming for a higher price, I'm willing to come down to $13,000. I believe this reflects the true value of the product.
I'm still interested in the product, but I need to be careful with my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering $11,250. This is my final offer, I'm not willing to go any higher.
